<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Horn of the Sun Aurochs](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1550)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Shadows at Sundown</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Shadows at Sundown](/Sources.aspx?ID=121) pg. 53

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A horn of the sun aurochs grants a +2 item bonus to [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks when played as an instrument.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The horn is clearly audible for hundreds of feet, but within a 20-foot emanation, the sound causes agony in those who wish harm upon the user; the horn also sheds [bright light](/Rules.aspx?ID=407) in that area and [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=408) to the next 20 feet. Enemies of the user in this area take 7d6 sonic damage and 7d6 good damage ([basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) DC 30 Fortitude save). Creatures that are specifically vulnerable to sunlight are also [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) if they fail this save or frightened 2 on a critical failure. This activation also attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) any [darkness](/Traits.aspx?ID=39) or [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145) effects in the area (+23 counteract check).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Horn of the Sun Aurochs
